Sunday Lunch Menu

Experience our carefully curated Sunday dining experience

Every Sunday, we present a special menu featuring the finest seasonal ingredients, expertly prepared and beautifully presented. Join us for a memorable dining experience that celebrates both tradition and innovation.

Sunday Service

Serving Time: 12:00 PM - 6:00 PM

Reservations: Highly recommended

Our Sunday Selection

Crafted with passion, served with pride

Starters

Soup of the Season

Creamy parsnip soup with warm spices and topped with crispy parsnips and a bread roll

£5.95

Farmhouse Pate

Creamy pork and chicken liver pate served with crostini and sweet pickle

£6.95

Classic Prawn Cocktail

Succulent prawns served on a bed of crisp lettuce, drizzled with a tangy Marie Rose sauce, garnished with a wedge of lemon and crostini

£6.95

Main Courses

Chicken Supreme or Pork Loin Roast

Accompanied by roast potatoes, Yorkshire pudding, bacon, sprouts, a chipolata, honey roasted carrots and parsnips, brocoli and gravy

£18.95

Beef or Veggie Wellington

Accompanied by pomme puree, honey roasted carrots and parsnips, fried sprouts, yorkshire pudding, brocolli and red wine jus

Beef - £20.95 Veggie - £18.95

Desserts

Apple Crumble

warm, spiced apples, topped with a buttery, golden crumble, served with vanilla ice cream

£5.95

Sticky Toffee Pudding

A classic sponge cake made with dates, drenched in warm toffee sauce and servced with a curl of homemade Baileys butter

£6.95

Eton Mess Sunday

Vanilla ice cream, crushed meringue, and strawberries piled high in a waffle cone

£6.95
